channel.title: CTF on CyberQuacker Rambling
channel.description: Recent content in CTF on CyberQuacker Rambling

item.title: MercyV2WalkThrough
item.description: Earlier this month, I attended a local sec talk. The main event was working to resolve the MercyV2 vulnhub box. Unfortunately during the event, I couldn’t do the box as mac m1s don’t support x86 virtual machines :P So I spent most of the night talking shit and helping teach some new cyber trainees steps on how to enumerate the box. No one finished the box or got close at the event that we know of so when I got home, I took it as a challenge to finish it.
